name: Baggage Blast-Off 6-Pair Hydra-Gel Eye Patch Kit
about: What it is:A mini kit of bestselling hydra-gel eye patches to visibly firm, hydrate, and depuff the under-eye area..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity, and Puffiness.Highlighted Ingredients:- 24K Gold: Firms and brightens the look of skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:The 24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Hydra-Gel Eye Patches visibly firm and brighten skin, the Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches drench skin with moisture, and the Cucumber De-Tox™ Hydra-Gel Eye Patches soothe, hydrate, and visibly depuff the delicate under-eye area..This Set Contains:- 24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Hydra-Gel Eye Patches (2 pairs, 4 patches)
ingredients: -24K Gold: Firms and brightens the look of skin..-Hyaluronic Acid: Is a potent hydrator that drenches skin with moisture and draws in water..-Cucumber Extract: Soothes, hydrates, and depuffs the look of skin...24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Hydra-Gel Eye Patches:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Colloidal Gold, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Caffeine, Niacinamide, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Tocopheryl Acetate, Allantoin, Jania Rubens Extract, Adenosine, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Calcium Lactate, Xanthan Gum, Disodium Edta, Peg-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Mica, Tin Oxide, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Gold (CI 77480), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)...Water Drench Hyaluronic Cloud Hydra-Gel Eye Patches:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Chondrus Crispus Powder, Glucomannan, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Allantoin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glucose, Althaea Officinalis Leaf Extract, Calcium Chloride, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Ceramide NP, Tocopherol, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Cimicifuga Racemosa Root Extract, Polygonum Multiflorum Root Extract, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Extract, Phellinus Linteus Extract, Angelica Gigas Root Extract, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Paeonia Lactiflora Root Extract, Sophora Angustifolia Root Extract, Hydroxyacetophenone, Chlorphenesin, Ethyl Hexanediol, Propanediol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Xylitylglucoside, Sucrose, Anhydroxylitol, Disodium EDTA, 1,2-Hexanediol, Scutellaria Baicalensis Root Extract, Gellan Gum, Glyceryl Caprylate, Xylitol, Betaine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Lecithin, Maltodextrin, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Copper Gluconate, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Norbornanediamine/Resorcinol Diglycidyl Ether Crosspolymer, Tin Oxide, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Mica/CI 77019, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891, FD&C Blue No. 1/CI 42090, Iron Oxides/CI 77491, Phenoxyethanol...Cucumber De-Tox™ Hydra-Gel Eye Patches:.Water/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Carrageenan, Dipropylene Glycol, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Caffeine, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate, Niacinamide, Adenosine, Allantoin, Maltodextrin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Butylene Glycol, Calcium Lactate, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Xanthan Gum, Dextrin, Potassium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Fragrance/Parfum, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090). ..The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently lift and separate a delicate gel patch..-Apply to a clean, dry under-eye area..-Repeat on other side..-Relax and enjoy for 10 to 15 minutes..-Discard after use and lightly pat remaining serum into skin..-For external use only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love these under eye patches, cooling and give a luxurious feeling when Im doing my makeup and need something extra

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product twice, the first time most of the eye patches were dry with no serum to rub in and some of them were ripped. I thought maybe it was a defective pack so I tried again, but it was the same experience with that pack as well.. maybe a little worse.  wouldn't recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No liquid at all, I am so upset. You basically put a piece of plastic under your eyes. I haven't noticed any difference after use as well. It's hard to believe a known company would do something like that, It's too bad to be true but it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good patches. This set allows you to try different types of patches. They're so good, that I already have my eyes set on the full size product! Also, great for stocking stuffers :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't see why 12 year olds can't use it, it doesn't have anything in it that's harmful to young skin so I would say anyone can use it no matter their age
